Description: This guitar is in mint condition. I purchased it new in 2012 and it has had minimal use (about 5 gigs) and has largely sat in its case in my closet. Great sound and plays beautifully. No scratches or wear on the guitar and comes with original hard shell case. I just have found that I really don't play it as I am primarily an acoustic player and play solo mostly these days. I hate to see instruments sit unused. Model 2012 LSD26HYCH3. Buyer pays all shipping. 30 days return accepted. Final shipping charge depends on location and will be calculated when item sells. Message me if you want more info/photos. US shipping only. All original pickups, Tuners, electronics, and hardware. Plays and sounds great, not your typical Studio, the coil taps and boost, really take it to the next level. Tobaccoburst finish with some nice flame in it, gorgeous looking. Gloss top, with satin back and sides, make the neck really fast, and sleek feel. Rosewood Fretboard for the classic Les Paul tone coupled with the Mahogany neck, body, and flamed Maple top. Original Hardshell Case like new. From the web:The arrival of the Gibson Les Paul Studio Electric Guitar in 1983 offered guitarists all the essential elements of a Les Paul Standard, including a carved top and humbucking pickups. The Les Paul Studio Deluxe II '60s Electric Guitar raises the bar with the cutting-yet-rich tone of a 490R humbucking pickup in the neck position and a BurstBucker Pro humbucking pickup in the bridge position, which are mounted on a carved maple top with a mahogany back. Both pickups offer coil splitting for single-coil sounds and a boost circuit via push/push switching in the volume controls. Straight Split coil-splitting offers pure single coil tone and differs from LP Standards and Studios that have a Super Tap coil-tap, which still has a small amount of humbucking. The boost circuit has a user-adjustable 10-dB boost for added power and frequency range.The hardware is finished in chrome including Grover tuners and Gibson's pioneering tune-o-matic bridge and stopbar tailpiece. The Les Paul Studio Deluxe is dependable and affordable ” and is built without any compromises. FEATURESA user-adjustable 10-dB boost for added power and frequency range for solos, single-note picking and dirty chording (depending on amp settings)'60s-style neck shapeTrue bypass: disengaging boost completely removes active circuit, ensuring pure passive Les Paul tone490R humbucking pickup in the neck position and a BurstBucker Pro humbucking pickup in the bridge positionEasy-to-use push/push pots engage coil-splits and boost circuitœStraight Split coil-splitting offers pure single coil toneGrover tuners, satin-finished back and sides
Title: 2012 Gibson Les Paul Studio Deluxe II Honey Burst - Mint Condition
